item.title: Ceph
item.description:
Ceph storage cluster

Once ceph storage cluster is deployed we can configure below ceph is based on RADOS - Reliable Autonomic Distributed Object Store. which handles storage, distribution and replication of data accross cluster

    uses CRUSH algorithm - how and where the data is stored

configurations

  • OSD - > each OSD is backed by a single storage device
  • monitor -> cluster membership, authentication,
  • manager -> provides interface to external monitoring and management system

OSD backend - Bluestore Metadata management with RocksDB(key/value database)
